description:
General InformationCompany
Deloitte
Business Unit
Tax & Legal
Primary Location
Watermael-Boitsfort
Field of interest
Finance & Risk
Industry Focus
Deloitte Private
Recruiter
van Oost, Alexandra - avanoost@deloitte.com
Description of the positionCan’t wait to make an impact on the world? You’re not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond.

Real estate is at the core of Deloitte’s industry specialties. We meet our clients’ expectations by delivering focused excellence, independence and fully integrated multidisciplinary services.

Our M&A & Finance - Real Estate advisory covers all possible challenges related to the raising of additional funding (debt, (quasi-) capital) for project developers, real estate investors and corporates purchasing a building.
We advise our clients through the following approach: assessment of client’s activities and real estate, modeling of the cashflow and the financial feasibility, defining the funding mix and funding structure, initiating a first market sounding, defining tax & legal structure & governance, drafting the investor- and/or bank memorandum, assistance in debt raising (both with bank- and leasing companies) and in (quasi-) equity go-to-market, supporting legal implementation and drafting fund(ing) documentation.

Your journey with us:

• Based on a thorough understanding of the clients’ business (strategy and historical results), you will propose the most appropriate real estate structuring solution. You will translate the client’s needs into a Deloitte offering describing our approach, timeline, project team, as well as a budget for the services to be delivered. You will play a crucial role throughout the process from the first client contact to contract signing and delivery.
• You will act as an expert in the financial aspects of real estate development, real estate investment and corporate real estate in general
• You will participate in different business development initiatives.
• Your connection with different (financial)-investor communities, and bank- and leasing companies, will be key for the success of this Real Estate advisory role.
• You will connect with our Tax and Legal team to set up an integrated offering related to our “M&A & Finance Real Estate approach”.
• You will coordinate different projects from A – Z by ensuring an end-to-end follow-up with the rest of the team and act as the single point of contact (SPOC) for the client. Both reviewing and execution will be part of the job, next to the coordination role.

Let’s talk about you

• You are passionate about real estate (both development and investment) and his different asset classes with a good market knowledge based on at least 5 years of relevant experience in real estate and its financials, as a banker, a corporate finance advisor, CFO…
• You have insights into fundraising solutions as finance specialist with notions of legal contracting. Insight into fund setup and structuring is a plus.
• Being connected with real estate developers- and investors communities is very valuable.
• You feel comfortable working on and managing multiple projects simultaneously.
• You are willing to go the extra mile for our clients.
• You are a proactive team player.
• You are willing to invest in tax related real estate topics.
• Having a consulting or advisory background with client-impact is a plus.

Our story
Business Process Solutions is so much more than hard numbers. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and insight meld. It’s what turns our professionals into trusted advisors who use regulatory compliance and reporting to create opportunities and manage risk for our clients. At Deloitte, we advise a wide range of companies across multidisciplinary services ranging from accounting, tax, legal, HR, mergers and acquisitions to services such as “business control & technology” and “strategy & growth” tailor-made solutions. At the same time, our team of advisors handles cases with a satellite vision, enthusiasm and know-how.
Let our professional experts take care of your administrative and financial worries. Whether you're a start-up, SME or family company, we adjust our services to the lifecycle and milestone moments of your business, helping you steer your company in your desired direction.

Who is Deloitte?
We provide industry-leading audit and assurance, tax and legal, consulting and related services. We are committed to driving innovation across offerings to help our clients address their challenges, while giving our professionals opportunities to learn and grow in this era of transformation.
In Belgium, +5000 dedicated professionals active in +10 offices, take great pride in bringing multidisciplinary expertise to a wide variety of clients, from national and international companies, small, fast-growing and large organizations to public institutions and governmental authorities.
Why Deloitte?
Be the true you! We foster diversity and inclusion and encourage you to bring your authentic self to work. Explore, question and collaborate while building a career that inspires and energises you.
Never stop growing! Diversity of thought makes us stronger. At Deloitte, we tailor a personalized learning experience, offering you the opportunity to grow at your own pace and achieve maximum impact.
We practice what we preach! As a Purpose-led organisation, at the heart of everything we do is a set of timeless principles and unifying values.
Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:
My Benefits My Choice, a flexible rewards plan tailored to your lifestyle and priorities
Sustainable transport options offered by Mobility@Deloitte
Flexible work arrangements for all and initiatives supported by Parents & Caregivers @Deloitte
Wellbeing tips and activities powered by Energise@Deloitte
Topped off with other health benefits and insurance opportunities

Empowering our employees with flexible work arrangements remains essential in today's reality:
Hybrid workplace: combination of home office and on-site (+10 offices in Belgium or client's premises).
Part-time employment: all our jobs are open to full-time or part-time work under a 90% or 80% regime.

Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

General Information

Company
Deloitte
Business Unit
Tax & Legal
Primary Location
Watermael-Boitsfort
Field of interest
Finance & Risk
Industry Focus
Deloitte Private
Recruiter
van Oost, Alexandra - avanoost@deloitte.com

Description of the position

Can’t wait to make an impact on the world? You’re not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond.

Real estate is at the core of Deloitte’s industry specialties. We meet our clients’ expectations by delivering focused excellence, independence and fully integrated multidisciplinary services.

Our M&A & Finance - Real Estate advisory covers all possible challenges related to the raising of additional funding (debt, (quasi-) capital) for project developers, real estate investors and corporates purchasing a building.
We advise our clients through the following approach: assessment of client’s activities and real estate, modeling of the cashflow and the financial feasibility, defining the funding mix and funding structure, initiating a first market sounding, defining tax & legal structure & governance, drafting the investor- and/or bank memorandum, assistance in debt raising (both with bank- and leasing companies) and in (quasi-) equity go-to-market, supporting legal implementation and drafting fund(ing) documentation.

Your journey with us:

  • Based on a thorough understanding of the clients’ business (strategy and historical results), you will propose the most appropriate real estate structuring solution. You will translate the client’s needs into a Deloitte offering describing our approach, timeline, project team, as well as a budget for the services to be delivered. You will play a crucial role throughout the process from the first client contact to contract signing and delivery.
  • You will act as an expert in the financial aspects of real estate development, real estate investment and corporate real estate in general
  • You will participate in different business development initiatives.
  • Your connection with different (financial)-investor communities, and bank- and leasing companies, will be key for the success of this Real Estate advisory role.
  • You will connect with our Tax and Legal team to set up an integrated offering related to our “M&A & Finance Real Estate approach”.
  • You will coordinate different projects from A – Z by ensuring an end-to-end follow-up with the rest of the team and act as the single point of contact (SPOC) for the client. Both reviewing and execution will be part of the job, next to the coordination role.


Let’s talk about you

  • You are passionate about real estate (both development and investment) and his different asset classes with a good market knowledge based on at least 5 years of relevant experience in real estate and its financials, as a banker, a corporate finance advisor, CFO…
  • You have insights into fundraising solutions as finance specialist with notions of legal contracting. Insight into fund setup and structuring is a plus.
  • Being connected with real estate developers- and investors communities is very valuable.
  • You feel comfortable working on and managing multiple projects simultaneously.
  • You are willing to go the extra mile for our clients.
  • You are a proactive team player.
  • You are willing to invest in tax related real estate topics.
  • Having a consulting or advisory background with client-impact is a plus.

Our story

Business Process Solutions is so much more than hard numbers. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and insight meld. It’s what turns our professionals into trusted advisors who use regulatory compliance and reporting to create opportunities and manage risk for our clients. At Deloitte, we advise a wide range of companies across multidisciplinary services ranging from accounting, tax, legal, HR, mergers and acquisitions to services such as “business control & technology” and “strategy & growth” tailor-made solutions. At the same time, our team of advisors handles cases with a satellite vision, enthusiasm and know-how.

Let our professional experts take care of your administrative and financial worries. Whether you're a start-up, SME or family company, we adjust our services to the lifecycle and milestone moments of your business, helping you steer your company in your desired direction.
